name: Path (Viktorion)
description:
Path is a small 2D game about dodging obstacles.

A very cool game! - Said no one ever.

This is a big dope ass game!! - Said Viktorion before making the game.

I love this game! - My teacher.

Ok but first, im going to buy some milk - Said my dad when i wanted to show him the game (he never came back 😢)

Release date: 25.01.2022

(Also available on Android )

[It would be available on iPhone if  there was a way to build an iOS app on a NOT MacBook device]
